name: Central Armed Police Forces (Asstt. Commandants) Exam, 2024

details.reason_for_rejection: Applications rejected due to non-payment of Examination fee.
details.appeal_process: Appeals against rejection can be made within 10 days along with documentary evidence by speed post or hand only.

name: Central Armed Police Forces (Assistant Commandants) Examination-2024

details.Closing of Entry into Examination Venue: 30 minutes before the scheduled commencement of the Examination, i.e. 09:30 A.M. for Forenoon Session and 01:30 P.M. for Afternoon Session.
details.Rules and Regulations: Candidates are not allowed to enter the examination premises with any valuable/costly items, smart/digital watches, other IT gadgets, books, bags etc., Candidates are also advised not to bring normal or simple wrist watches inside the Examination Rooms/ Halls.
